column4: can any1 here help with cron? ive tried to set up a cron file looking like this "* 4,10,16,21 * * * sh  ./home/pord/.change.sh" but it never runs the sh file at the time. I know the sh file works
make ./home/pord/.change.sh executable and omit the sh
the leading . on ./home/pord/.change.sh looks wrong, too
have you solved your cron problem?
